page.title: 16My Normal Day
page.content: Every day I get up, wash and clean my teeth,ready for breakfast which is normally cereal and toast. Then I brush my hair,get my coat and shoes,pick up my lunch box by which time my friend Lucy is ringing the doorbell. At school we change our shoes and take our lunch boxes to the trolley. After our early morning work our class splits into groups,doing maths,writing,science,art or cooking. After a short play I go down to lunch,where Lucy and I give out lunch boxes. After lunch and another short play we come in and read from 1.30-2.00. Then we work from 2.00-3.30. When school is finished Lucy and I play with one another. When I go inside I often watch television until 9.00 or read then have a bath before going to bed.
